name: How to make Instant Pot Kerala Vegetable Stew
description: Instant Pot Kerala Vegetable Stew - A complete Comfort and Satisfying food that can be made in a fraction of the time. Veg Stew is Vegetarian / Vegan Instant Pot Recipe with lots of vegetables in coconut milk based hearty sauce that will change your life.

video.name: Instant Pot Kerala Vegetable Stew | Vegan stew recipe | vegetable Stew recipe in instant Pot
video.description:
Instant Pot Kerala Vegetable Stew - A complete Comfort and Satisfying food that can be made in a fraction of the time. Veg Stew is Vegetarian / Vegan Instant Pot Recipe with lots of vegetables in coconut milk based hearty sauce that will change your life.

Detailed Recipe of Instant pot Kerela vegetable stew https://www.cookingcarnival.com/instant-pot-kerala-vegetable-stew/
Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/cookingcarnival

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/cookingcarnival/

recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp - Chili ((adust according to your liking) )

recipeInstructions.text: Turn on saute button of your IP.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn on saute button of your IP.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a pot, add cardamom pods, cinnamon stick, and cloves.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a pot, add cardamom pods, cinnamon stick, and cloves.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add ginger, garlic, chili and onions. Saute for few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add ginger, garlic, chili and onions. Saute for few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the vegetables, salt, white pepper powder and water. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the vegetables, salt, white pepper powder and water. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover your Instant pot with locking lid.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover your Instant pot with locking lid.

recipeInstructions.text: Press the manual or pressure cook button. Cook on high pressure for 3 minutes with pressure valve in the sealing position.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the manual or pressure cook button. Cook on high pressure for 3 minutes with pressure valve in the sealing position.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, take whole cashew and coconut milk in a blender jar and blend them well in to a smooth paste. Keep it aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, take whole cashew and coconut milk in a blender jar and blend them well in to a smooth paste. Keep it aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Once IP beeps and when you see LO:00, turn off your IP and quick release the pressure.
recipeInstructions.name: Once IP beeps and when you see LO:00, turn off your IP and quick release the pressure.

recipeInstructions.text: 10. Open the Instant Pot, add prepared cashew-coconut paste. Stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: 10. Open the Instant Pot, add prepared cashew-coconut paste. Stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: 11. Turn on saute button and cook it for 1 to 2 more minutes, until everything well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: 11. Turn on saute button and cook it for 1 to 2 more minutes, until everything well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: 13. Instant Pot Kerala Vegetable Stew is ready. Enjoy!!
recipeInstructions.name: 13. Instant Pot Kerala Vegetable Stew is ready. Enjoy!!

keywords: Easy vegan instant pot recipe, Instant pot, Vegetable Stew
